name: humble
description: - dan running the UX hype - judith devving the ops - kin mastering the scrum - reggie keeping the quality high

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NODE_ENV=production cd client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.dev:build: NODE_ENV=test cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && nodemon index.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test cd client && npm test && cd ../server && npm test
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test cd server && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false && codecov
